title: Accessor
description: A typed view into a buffer that contains raw binary data

byteOffset.description: The offset into the buffer in bytes.

componentType.description: The datatype of the accessor's components.

componentCount.description: The number of components per element.

count.description: The number of elements referenced by this accessor.

byteStride.description: The stride, in bytes, between elements in the accessor. When this is not defined, data is tightly packed.

max.description: Maximum value of each component in this accessor. Array elements **MUST** be treated as having the same data type as accessor's `componentType`. Both `min` and `max` arrays have the same length.  The length is determined by the value of the `componentCount` property.

min.description: Minimum value of each component in this accessor. Array elements **MUST** be treated as having the same data type as accessor's `componentType`. Both `min` and `max` arrays have the same length.  The length is determined by the value of the `componentCount` property.
